page.description: Returns a crlf delimited string of tables in a set,
page.syntax: Output_String as C = tables_in_set(C setname [,L fully_qualified_paths ])

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The name of a set. The extension ".set" is assumed.

argument.name: fully_qualified_paths
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. (TRUE) to display fully qualified filenames.
.F. (FALSE) to show only filenames.

page.discussion: TABLES_IN_SET() returns a CR-LF delimited list of files composing the set defined by Set_Name.
page.example: tables_in_set("code",.f.) -> c:\databases\functions\FUNCTIONS.DBF c:\databases\functions\METHODS.DBF tables_in_set("code",.f.) -> FUNCTIONS.DBF METHODS.DBF tables_in_set("code") -> FUNCTIONS.DBF METHODS.DBF
